MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:00am to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network located outside 35 Westland and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:08am on Tuesday, 13 April 2021
